Uses of Class
io.permazen.PermazenTransaction

Packages that use PermazenTransaction
Package
Description
io.permazen
Abstraction layer allowing access to a Database using normal Java objects.
io.permazen.change
Classes passed to @OnChange-annotated methods.
io.permazen.cli
Components that support integrating Permazen into a Java Console Toolkit console.
io.permazen.spring
Spring Framework integration classes.

  • Uses of PermazenTransaction in io.permazen

    Subclasses of PermazenTransaction in io.permazen
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    DetachedPermazenTransaction
    A PermazenTransaction that is not actually connected to a Permazen database instance, but instead exists just to hold objects in memory.
